__e: I don't know, some fantasy where you and I could be together.
She doesn't know where you are, and she still has hope that you're alive.
I think it's because you've lost hope that the work has meaning.
I can't believe I thought there was hope for you.
If you don't know, without question, that I'm not a killer... then there really is no foundation for us to build on.
And it was my order that destroyed... their last chance for peace.
But it's our last, best hope for peace.
It can be a dangerous place.
It's our only hope of finding the plague before they do.
And I survived, I survived with the only hope to find my other son alive, but I have nothing to seek,
And your hopes of finding your daughter... well, they die with you.
One, she still has a heartbeat, so there may just be a way to pull her back from her zombified state.
Unless you know where she is, we're your dad's only hope.
But she may be our best hope at knowing if we can trust him.
My only hope is to find someone with something and make them like me.
Your only hope is to tell me so I can hopefully one day share your struggle with the world.
Best hope is to get him talking, but that could be tough.
Babe, my only hope is for us to be happy, healthy, and in love forever.
Your only hope is to tell me so I can hopefully one day share your struggle with the world.
Best hope is to get him talking, but that could be tough.
We must not lose heart, that's all.
I think we do what we can, we hope for the best, and that's all anybody can do. Right?
You're our only hope, It's up to you now,
But I haven't given up hope and neither should you.
There's no one. No chance. And it's all my fault.
There is no hope for him, nor for me.
